title: Collate AI Tier Agent
description: The Collate AI Tier Agent will review the lineage and usage of your data and assign a Tier to it, helping you identify business critical assets quickly. We currently support Tables and will keep adding more assets in the future.

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: You can use the UI Query Filter builder to select the assets that you want to generate the Tier for. You can filter by any property of your tables: the service, database or schema they belong to, their name, owners, domain,... and even by Custom Properties!

patchIfEmpty.title: Patch Tier If Empty
patchIfEmpty.description: The Tier Agent will only suggest a Tier by default. By toggling this option, the Agent will automatically update the table with the Tier if there's no Tier assigned to it yet.
